do leave me yr numbers again pls? 
comments all screened (:

thanks love

Auntie Michelle's maid just committed suicide last night. She was a cheerful 32 year-old lady, here to earn more money to support her family back home. 

Why did she do it? 
A 56 year-old Singaporean bastard cheated all her hard-earned money.

Our hamster is pregnant!!! (x 
Baby said he felt a lump in Luna's tummy! and also 'cos DK is sooo much smaller than her now. 

Yayy!!!

false hope pfft!

Joy and I are busy looking at Coach baggies when we should be doing our work. ugh  temptation!! so hard to resist 

sneek peek!!!




I know they look the same, BUT THEY'RE NOT!! love

Happy 6 Months (:

Went to catch the Singapore vs Malaysia match. So much atmosphere! 

Will update soon with pix .. kinda shag now

I have not been updating much, while my memory is beginning to fail me (actually I'm just lazy)

School has been ... normal. The usual boring lectures, laughing at the lecturers' articulation, longlong tutorials/seminars, gossiping etc. 

Late night bitching with the girls is always good. We played Joker (aka Old Maid/Donkey just that we used Jokers ... you get the drift) which was hilarious! A dosage a week is simply not enough anymore, but sadly, school is of existence.

Wine tasting with Cassan at Bukit Timah. I finally found a place where no public toilets are available! Unless you happen to walk into one of the 2 shops that actually have a squatting toilet. (I don't do the squatting pee-ing thing) Anyhow, I got something for the dear! Hope he'll like it.

Emos' bday dinner at Capers, The Regent Singapore. Some International Buffet dinner which tasted yummy, albeit a lil pricy. Burnt a lil hole in my pocket cos I treated Baby to it as well. So Emos I gave you 2 presents this year!!! You better not forget my flaming lambo. (:

Loved the tiger prawns (I've always had a thing for prawns), the beef is slurps but depending on whether you prefer the well-done, or medium-well - and also your picking skills cos they are all mixed up. Lamb chop (which I saw Rodney puke out cos he couldn't stand the smell) was not too bad as well, if you are not as sensitive to the smell. Best of all, desserts!!! Bao and I just kept waiting for them to change sorbet flavours; we had strawberry, lemon and mango sorbet !! Yummy!!! And I tricked Bao into thinking that the mashed potato was lemon sorbet HAHA!! Fyi, the mashed potato is awesome!

Baby and I went to catch the Pan's Labyrinth midnight show. It's this Spanish film similar to Narnia, but with a different concept. Held in 1944, it actually portrays the stark contrast in the harsh realities of life and the innocence of a little girl. It's nice, if you look deeper into it. If you're looking for a movie where you can just sit back and not work your mind (ala chick flicks) then don't watch it. Don't insult the show.

It's a bit late, but still ... Happy 2007! 

Spent the wonderful moment with dearie, and nothing else matters (:

Hung out with cassan, xinyu and yiwen in town. Some of the things that crossed our topics of conversation:

(1) Why are smoking areas so restricted? Like what yw said, people can only smoke outdoors. So if you don't like the smoke, go indoors! In an outlet, be it a cafe or coffeeshop, there are only less than 10 miserable tables assigned to smokers. If that's not bad enough, non-smokers have to take up the 'smoking' table! Hello weirdos??? I thought you can't stand the smoke? 

(2) In the whole of Orchard MRT, inclusive of underpass and area outside popular bookstore (that's already the second level), there is NOT a single dustbin to be found!!! If munching and drinking are not allowed in the premises of the MRT control station, please provide an effing dustbin!! 

(3) Oh, and mothers, please learn to control your kids. I know they are kids, some of whom can't even speak, but for crying out loud, educate them with some form of basic etiquette. Your kid likes to sit the swing? Fine! Bring him to a playground. Not let him sit on your lap and kick everyone around him - ahem that includes me! Not once, not twice, but so many times! And what does the mother do? NOTHING! But let the kid continue disrupting the peace in the train! 

(4) Something linked to (3), Yiwen mentioned an incident with her neighbours. Seriously, parents nowadays do not control their kids. They pamper them too much, let them do whatever they want, to the point of them being a social pest! Yes, I used the word pest, which imo, is very very kind. And people actually wonder why teenagers/youths are so ill-mannered and disrespectful. Because they have such parents! 

Gosh. Society norms are just a piece of crap. On one hand, they wince at modernism, at women who are more daring to dress (not skanky of course, just those more fashionable. I assume you are a wise, fashionable reader who can tell the difference) but they accept uncouth behavior. 

Anyhoos, time for dinner ...

Caught Saw III just now with baby at Grand Cathay. We didn't realise it was R21 till baby told me that there will be a guy at the door checking identification! panic attack Luckily there was a group of young-looking ppl in front of us who had their i/cs checked. So I "snuck" in with them (:

If you thought Saw II was gory, this is worse!!! Saw I was nothing; Saw II had a lil more bloody scenes. Saw III was filled with it! Initially, I kept gripping baby because it was so painful - painful for the victim, such that looking at him suffer made watching him feel painful. But Saw III was good - normally you'd expect trilogies to suck at the end. 

Awesome.

Love you dear (:
Ham will never run away from you!

Jiemeis came all the way to pulau-NTU to bring me wonderful supper!! Hokkien mee, Oyster omelette and cheng tng from ChompChomp. Not forgetting the new Esprit tote they got me!! Feel so loved!

Soo came!!! Omg I haven't seen her in God-knows how long. And Yinsiu is back! The whole gang together again (: 

Everyone mentions about me and old. Darn. Only Yik said I am young! Ha! So sweet (though he was being sarcastic)

Received alot of unexpected birthday wishes from alot of peeps. Thanks to all who wished me well. A lovely birthday indeed

Fab dinner with baby (: 

Contrary to popular belief (and I think it is rather well-known) I was early today! Like 40 minutes early heh. Jason got quite a shock but he was already in town. (suspicious suspicious) He was acting not-so-normally so I got kinda wary. And he kept saying that I was interrogating him (which in a way is true). Told me soooo many tall tales but it was all to surprise me (: 

Brought me to Dan Ryan's for dinner. Great food with huge portions. Seriously, it was special and delicious, which totally offsets the price. Plus, the service is very good. Wouldn't mind going back for more! 

I was happily munching on my Seafood Penne with Cheese Sause (or the likes) when I was suddenly greeted by the restaurant staff holding a Molten Choc Cake (slurps) and a present from baby. I felt quite embarrassed actually, shock but embarrassed - in a good way of course. 

So yeah, that was why he was in town so early. 

Present? A Coach wallet !!! Not the Hamptons series that I ohsolove, but a new collection which is similar to one of them. Very nice!!! Brownish and ohsogorgeous. My cable is screwed up, so I'll upload the photos another time. 

Meanwhile, I shall bask in the remaining 3 hours and 15 mins of my 19 y.o life

comment and i'll give you a letter; then you have to list 10 things you love that begin with that letter. after that, post this in your journal, and give out some letters of your own.

Ccube gave me an M! wth 

1. My Magician boy (: I really love tagging along to his shows (free personal assistant); though I've seen his tricks many times, I still love watching him perform. But I love my baby, magician or not.

2. Mmoo-moon-monster kill! Yes, dota. Haha (I'd prefer Godlike though)

3. Moolah-spending = shopping!! hey, noone said I can't create my own words :p

4. Martel! and any other form of liquor actually. but Booze starts with B!!! so ...

[Side track: Ccube this is not fun!! grrr .. why not S?! or C!!!]

5. Mummy!! Mummy loves me, and I love mummy too! Btw, mummy's very interested about Botak (SEE!! Botak starts with B too) but my baldy is ch***en (C!!!)

6. Miniskirts hahaha Hell, I suck in jeans. Skirts are so much more sher-friendly

7. Music. I played the organ before haha But music as in generally music. Like... listening and singing and clubbing. 

8. My Motorola V3i - my darling hp! I can't live without it 

9. Mathematics! Seriously ... I love math. You'll be surprised 

10. Merry!! I love to be happy, and I'd love for everyone to be happy too (: 

omg I'm finally done. Hey!! I love alot of things that doesn't start with M too. But I'm not complaining (:

Krispy Kreme was heaven!!! Baby and the whole corridor savoured it. Thank you Xinyu and Wei Ying - I had a dozen to myself. Awesome

Anyhoo, baby was warring just now, and there was this guy on his team that kept making me laugh. 


hahah! noone put sentry ward in front of their own tower one laa!! Oh and previously, he bought observer wards because he wanted to counter sa. lol

Did I mention?
I haven't warred in 2 days!!! gawd

Orites! Back to Books. Hope I don't freak out halfway ...

1) Put your music player on shuffle
2) Press forward for each question.
3) Use the song title as the answer to the question.
4) NO CHEATING!!!

The questions and my answers:

1) How am I feeling today?
Temperature - Sean Paul  (oh yes, I'm literally having a temp)

2) Where will I get married?
Time after Time - Cindy Lauper (errr no!!!)

3) What is my best friend's theme song?
My Sacrifice - Creed (aren't I a good friend (: )

4) What is/was high school like?
Ridin' Dirty - Chamillionaire feat Krazie Bone (err wokay *whistle*)

5) What is the best thing about me?
To Stay - Breeze (grins)

6) How is today going to be?
Gold Digger - Kayne West (Coach Hampton wallet??)

7) What is in store for this weekend?
How Deep Is Your Love - Take that (Baby!!!! (x )

8) What song describes my parents?
Salt Shaker - Ying Yang Twins (???!?!?!!!)

9) How is my life going?
Against All Odds - Mariah Carey (that's more like it!)

10) What song will they play at my funeral?
London Bridge - Fergie (hehe)

11) How does the world see me?
Me and My Girlfriend - Tupac

12) What do my friends really think of me?
Obsession - Frankie J (... I just hope that it's YOU peeps obsessed with me haha)

13) Do people secretly lust after me?
Too Much Booty - Soundmaster T (I know I've a huge ass - dammit)

14) How can I make myself happy?
I Hate Myself for Loving You - Joan Jett (hahah mambo!!!)

15) What should I do with my life?
Numb/Encore - JayZ & Linkin Park (erms... my life is great I know, haha)

16) Will I ever have children?
Only God Knows Why - Kid Rock (yes, only God knows whether I'll have children)

17) What is some good advice?
Err Time - Nelly (eh?)

18) What do I think my current theme song is:
Shake Ya Tail Feather - Nelly (why all Nelly?! Yeah, I'm gonna party soooon!! But this is Xinyu's song!!)

19) What does everyone else think my current theme song is:
I Want To Break Free - Queen (err.. from exams yes)

20) What type of men/women do you like?
Scandalous - Mystique (haha nooo!! I like serious mAn - like my baby haha)

21) Will you get married?
In the Club - Fifty Cent (eh? I want to get married in the Chapel!! lol and I think that means, YES! pfft)

22) What should I do with my love life?
Shou Fang Kai - Li Sheng Jie (knn!!! NOO!! I hate this questionaire Cassan!!)

24) Where will you live?
Summer '69 - Brian Adams (yess!! always summer)

25) What will your dying words be?
Always - Bon Jovi (Always in your hearts!! As you guys will always be in mine (: )

haha this is fun!! more cassan moremore!!!

My weekend has been quite a ... weight-gaining yet funfilled one!
In less than 24hrs, I ate ... suuper zuizui dimsum, crab beehoon (slurps!), cereal prawns (slurps!), a few zhi cha dishes, a hotcake with sausage meal (slurps!) and a few bars of choco. rubs tummy  What a life! 

Saturday was dimsum buffet with the guys and baby at Miramar Hotel. Not as fantabuloustic as I was made to believe; quite sad. But we ordered alotalot and ate 99% of them! So I was quite happy (:

And on that very day, I became an Aunty! Cousin Celine gave birth to a baby boy - Cayden. So cuute!! He's soo small, aww! But thing was, my sis and I din know she was even pregnant -.- silly daddy

Plus my sister and her bf bought 2 male 18-day-old winter white dwarf hamsters - so cuute!! She named them Garfield and Odie. They're smaller than my thumb!! Can you imagine? So cuute!!

Woke up suuper early in the morning today (like 7??) to go East Coast Park with my sis and her bf. We went blading and cycling! I think I should continue practicing my blading - hopefully one day I'll become as pro as those hotchicks on american tv. (erms)

Happy 22nd Birthday Rubrub!!!

Momo was surprisingly great! Great music, fab crowd of friends! Qimou, as usual, reacted to the alcohol in his body - but no striptease this time! (I can hear you people going 'aww' in the background haa) BUT! Kissing action was definitely not forgotten. Alot of funny incidents but I shall let the photos (and Joy) do all the talking.

The live band was poweerrr !!! The lead was very communicative; created good rapport with the audience (and Joy and I). We were just sitting there, enjoying the peace and serenity of the music... away from all the rowdiness. 

Click anywhere on this sentence to view all 174 photos taken!! 

-----

Last night's Mac stone table supper was darn funny. All the crappy jokes and what not, just brought the good old goofy freshie days back again (: 

Oh yes, and one incident which was kinda embarrassing, though not really on my part haha. Zhida's friend dropped by, and he claimed to know me.

He: Hello! 
Me: Huh???

Emos laughed damn loud laa!! He was quite embarrassed so he just walked off and talked to Zhida. After that, when Zhida told me his friend's name, I realised that he is baby's rugby friend, Eric. oops

MOS last night, entry courtesy of Cheryl Tay, baby's sports club friend. Saved us from the excruciatingly long and painful queue. 

Hopped down to 7-11 to get beers and tequila, and drank at the bridge at Riverside Point. The guys were damn funny, especially after alcohol entered their body. 

I realised that my template and lj-cut don't quite like each other. Photos under the cut though, so click on 'comments' to view them. Likewise, the whole night's photos are on my Imagestation.


Baby and Gabriel caught off guard. Gay-briellll is damn funny la!! haha especially when he's drunk. lol
Gaybriel: I think Jason is hot!


The guys drinking at the bridge. It was suuper kok!!


Groupie shot!!! Albeit it being kinda small


The CJC gang. The girl's Charlene, AhKow's friend. I think she's very sweet - caiiii!!! AhKow knows alot of caiii lor!!


Baby and I posing stuupid. hee


Arjun was singing "Toyko Drift" the entire night!! Was especially funny when it came on in MOS. lol

To end it off ...

Forever taking stuupid shots of ourselves (:

I never ever had a curfew before - ever!

Baby set a bedtime curfew for me! 
I've to be in bed by 1am every weekday night - except on clubbing nights. o m g !!! He suddenly remembered it tonight at 3plus am, and chased me off to bed. Drastic. But not before he remembered that I broke the "curfew" yesterday when I only slept pass 5. 

Poor me ): 
Did I say poor me? I meant, whoopeee!!!

Is there any place where one can study in the middle of the night? Which has food and proper air-conditioning?? 

I've been at my books for the past 3 to 4 hours, since I came back to my cosy lil room in Pulau NTU. Feel a little accomplished as I've completed one tutorial and read through one set of lecture notes. But that's peanuts ... compared to the mountain of work that I have. 

I need some place peaceful ... like West Coast Macs. But I don't have any transport there. I need to park myself at some place conducive. Ugh!! Any ideas?? Any studybuddies??

We were at Suntec waiting to catch our midnight movie. Had about an hour to kill, so we walked around a lil. That was when we saw snuffles, sitting by the windowpane, looking up at us hopefully with those round beady eyes of his. 

"So cuute!!!" was the first thing that came out of my mouth. 

A week and a half later, he was mine.

My 2 precious (:
Baby made me my favourite tauhuay with glutinous rice peanut balls!! (:

Was playing with Joy's new hp's camara function 'warped mode'.

Baozie


Me


Emos looks like he's balding lol


Emos: if my son looks like that i'll disown him

haha he looks like a lil geek right?!

My roomie thinks our room is doraemon's pocket! 
It's soo messy!!! o m g but it's very cosy.

Joy bought me choco!! But I didn't know ... and throughout the entire weekend I was so tempted to just gobble it all down! 

Joy: But I put it on your table!
Me: You put everything on my table!
(haha)

Haven't been very productive though. I kept playing mahjong solitaire, watched Over The Hedge with emos, went paparazzi-ing ... wishing that baby will suddenly come back to bring me out - which he didn't of course.

I'm a bored lil rag doll in her messy lil room!!

I've been feeling a lil under the weather recently. Maybe the serious lack of sleep is the main culprit.

I'm thankful to all those who drag me away from work sometimes, and give me a lil to laugh about, to smile about. Guess that has been lacking in my life recently.

---

I want to go to the beach and see the stars.
I want to go to Rochester Park and admire the majestic colonial bungalows.

He was telling me all the little details, including the many many times that I nearly caught him. He claimed that his "balls shrank". haha 

(: really grateful for everything. I've never felt luckier

The day started off quite bad actually. I woke up to realise that my hotpink bra and black&gold striped v-string got stolen!!! Dear came to find me to console slash poke fun at me. But he was really sweet, as usual, and seeing him made me feel loads better.

Then it was shopping with Baozie! The mrt ride was hell for her cos of some lil indian kid who kept touching her with his icky-sticky fingers. What more, he even slapped her pants with his shoes! Baozie was sooo infuriated! haha But you should have been there to see the look on her face, it was darn funny!

Shopping was rather fruitful though. Newly added to my wardrobe were 3 different genres of tops, and 3 pairs of earrings atop my, albeit pathetic, collection. Not forgetting my kinda chui manicure.

Jogging 2 days in a row with Joy! O M G our stamina deteriorated like mad, man. But! At least I still can last quite long, so kudos to that! Let's just hope we won't slack into the semester.

The day was nicely finished off with supper (actually dinner for me) with dearie. Spoke of certain issues, and we're happy that we haven't had any disagreements so far. (:


Sometimes, I just can't stop myself from thinking. It's not about the trust, or the faith, or whatever you may call it. Sometimes, it's just natural that people have such thoughts. But as I've mentioned, they are just mere thoughts. I know that you know me well enough. And you should know that I trust you too. 

And I thank you for trusting me more than that. I really do.

Things aren't right.

Everyone knows but they wont tell
But their half hided smiles tell me something just aint right
I've been waiting on you for a long time
Fueling up on heartaches and I'd whine

Baby got attacked by nature! Frogs and mosquitoes and insects and whatnots! haha and the sweet good night msg. He's so adorable. 

I'm really thankful for you dear, truly. (:

Seriously, even now that I have it, everything still feels the same. Prolly cos it has almost been this way all along, such that this so-called 'change' doesn't seem like such a big deal anymore.  

The only change, I suppose, is the sudden existing fear. I'm suddenly not so certain anymore.

The boy has been bugging me to take an IQ test for the past 2 days. He predicted that my IQ is around 120, and his around 130.

He scored 128 (around 130. above average). And I scored 147 (around 150, gifted) haha Poor boy was so stunned and sad, he refused to talk to me. Said he knew I was smart but didn't expect me to have an IQ higher than his. lalalalalaaa I'm smarter than my RJ boy (:

So bad that he ran to his bed, lay there curled up and had such a glum expression on his face he reminded me of a lil baby. 
My stupid lil beeg boy

It's not fair.

I hate you.

People keep talking to me. And things just start running through my mind 

I suppose I keep expecting something ... outta nothing at all! Prolly why everytime things don't happen, my disappointment level drops 10,000 notches. Maybe I shouldn't set any expectations. Prolly then will I be void of any emotions. 

After buying his present, I felt very happy. I look at my loot and I really felt very happy. But now, just looking at it makes me feel like tearing it to pieces. 

Can't wait to see Joy again. I miss sitting/standing with her at one corner, having hearty talks and spitting bullshite all at the same time (:

Woke up from a bad dream. It seemed so real 'cos you were in it.

My eyes were slightly moist.
Why don't you just stab me right through and through.

Emm said to me, that he felt jealous that ccube stole hong away from him. That hong was once his. aww

Emm: Now I'm walking back to my room alone.

haha poor emos.

I should have known better.

Sorry. To myself, mostly.

Does slapping you softly many times make up for one big slap??


I doubt so.

Is this a dagger which I see before me,
The handle toward my hand? Come, let me clutch thee.
I have thee not, and yet I see thee still.
Art thou not, fatal vision, sensible
To feeling as to sight? or art thou but
A dagger of the mind, a false creation,
Proceeding from the heat-oppressed brain?
I see thee yet, in form as palpable
As this which now I draw.
Macbeth (2.1.33-61)
it's the sweet lil things... how can I not

Sometimes I don't understand the things I do. That's why, more often than not, I can't answer your questions.  

Perhaps I need some time away ...
This lil gurl (according to him) here finally got the question out of her mouth. So kudos to that!!

My dreams scared me. I vaguely remember it; only knew I woke up cold, shaky and alone. I'm weaker than I thought.

how can you be so far away lying by my side

Ccube and I were saying ... 
We often ask questions, hoping the answers we get will fit the ones we have silently - be it subconsciously or not - chosen.

Goodbye

I love you, but ...

We both know I'm not what you need.

So please, don't cry.

For the last time,

I love you
